description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
individual initiating a food transfer (initiator of food transfer)
individual who is the recipient of the initiator’s actions (recipient of an interaction)
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
name of the two participants that compose the dyad
number of session (one each day)- 8 in total
Taking/ Offer/ Request/ Dropping/ but dropping is not included in analyses

could be between -1 and 1/ if positive- then the initiator is higher ranking than the recipient/ if negative- then the initiator is lower ranking then the recipient. The greater the difference (eg 0.65 rather than 0.25) the greater the difference between two individuals
unrelated or related (this could be mother and offspring/ but also father and offspring if known- or sisters- or grandma and grandchild)
whether food was transferred (yes) or not (no) or unknown
amount (whole/ parts) of food items exchanged
